languages.text: "Поквитаться, пороча династию, к которой сам принадлежит и на главенство в которой претендовал? Он мразь, но не идиот. Нет, тут, думаю, иное. Много кто может хотеть ослабить фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Поквитаться, пороча династию, к которой сам принадлежит и на главенство в которой претендовал? Он мразь, но не идиот. Нет, тут, думаю, иное. Много кто может хотеть ослабить фон Валанциус".

languages.text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "Поквитаться, пороча династию, к которой сам принадлежит и на главенство в которой претендовал? Он мразь, но не идиот. Нет, тут, думаю, иное. Много кто может хотеть ослабить фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and to the supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken the von Valancius."

"Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and to the supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken the von Valancius."

"Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

"Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

"Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

languages.text: 「自身が属する王朝と、自身が主張した覇権に泥を塗ってまで仕返しをするとでも？彼はろくでなしかもしれませんが愚者ではありません。別の者の仕業でしょう。フォン・ヴァランシウス家の力を弱らせようとする者は大勢います」
languages.original_text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: 「自身が属する王朝と、自身が主張した覇権に泥を塗ってまで仕返しをするとでも？彼はろくでなしかもしれませんが愚者ではありません。別の者の仕業でしょう。フォン・ヴァランシウス家の力を弱らせようとする者は大勢います」

languages.text: “他打算玷污他的王朝，削弱他自己的权力，以此进行报复吗？他是个人渣，但并不是白痴。不，我觉得是别的原因，有很多人都打算削弱冯·瓦兰修斯家族的力量。”
languages.original_text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: “他打算玷污他的王朝，削弱他自己的权力，以此进行报复吗？他是个人渣，但并不是白痴。不，我觉得是别的原因，有很多人都打算削弱冯·瓦兰修斯家族的力量。”

languages.text: «¿"Hacérnoslo pagar" mancillando la dinastía a la que pertenece y la supremacía que reclama? Será un sinvergüenza, pero no un necio. No, creo que esto es distinto. La casa von Valancius tiene muchos enemigos».
languages.original_text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: «¿"Hacérnoslo pagar" mancillando la dinastía a la que pertenece y la supremacía que reclama? Será un sinvergüenza, pero no un necio. No, creo que esto es distinto. La casa von Valancius tiene muchos enemigos».

languages.text: « Prendre sa revanche en ternissant la réputation de sa propre dynastie et sa suprématie sur les terres qu'il revendique ? Kunrad est une ordure, mais pas un imbécile. Non, je pense qu'il s'agit d'autre chose. De nombreuses personnes souhaitent affaiblir la maison von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: « Prendre sa revanche en ternissant la réputation de sa propre dynastie et sa suprématie sur les terres qu'il revendique ? Kunrad est une ordure, mais pas un imbécile. Non, je pense qu'il s'agit d'autre chose. De nombreuses personnes souhaitent affaiblir la maison von Valancius. »

languages.text: "Indem er die Dynastie besudelt, zu der er gehört und auf deren Überlegenheit er Anspruch erhoben hat? Er ist Abschaum, aber kein Idiot. Nein, ich denke, es ist jemand anders. Viele wollen das Haus von Valancius schwächen."
languages.original_text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Indem er die Dynastie besudelt, zu der er gehört und auf deren Überlegenheit er Anspruch erhoben hat? Er ist Abschaum, aber kein Idiot. Nein, ich denke, es ist jemand anders. Viele wollen das Haus von Valancius schwächen."

languages.text: "Mensubu olduğu ve başı olduğunu iddia ettiği hanedanlığın adına leke sürerek mi? Şerefsizin teki olabilir ama aptal da değildir. Yok, bence bu başka bir şey. Von Valancius Hanesi'ni zayıflatmak isteyen kişi çoktur."
languages.original_text: "Get even by besmirching the dynasty to which he belongs and supremacy over which he laid claim? He is scum, but he's no idiot. No, I think this is something else. There are many who wish to weaken House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Ait olduğu ve iddiasına göre egemenlik sahibi olduğu hanedanlığın adına leke sürerek mi? Adi herifin teki olabilir ama bir aptal değildir. Hayır, bence bu başka bir şey. Von Valancius Hanesi'ni zayıflatmak isteyen daha birçok kişi var."
